description: Automate your Slack workspace interactions by posting messages, replying to threads, adding reactions, and fetching channel or user information. Streamline Slack communication and management with easy-to-use tools accessible via the Model Context Protocol. Enhance productivity by integrating Slack API capabilities directly into your workflows.

SLACK_TEAM_ID.description: The Slack Team ID for the workspace

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: The Bot User OAuth Token for the Slack app

capabilities.name: channels_list_on_slack
capabilities.description: List public channels in the workspace with pagination

capabilities.name: send_message_on_slack
capabilities.description: Post a new message to a Slack channel. Provide either channel_id or channel_name.

capabilities.name: reply_to_thread_on_slack
capabilities.description: Reply to a specific message thread in Slack. Provide either channel_id or channel_name.

capabilities.name: get_channel_history_on_slack
capabilities.description: Get recent messages from a channel. Provide either channel_id or channel_name.

capabilities.name: get_thread_replies_on_slack
capabilities.description: Get all replies in a message thread. Provide either channel_id or channel_name.

capabilities.name: get_users_on_slack
capabilities.description: Get a list of all users in the workspace with their basic profile information

capabilities.name: get_user_profile_on_slack
capabilities.description: Get detailed profile information for a specific user

capabilities.name: get_channel_messages_on_slack
capabilities.description: Fetch the last N messages from a Slack channel (by channel_id or channel_name).

capabilities.name: get_mentions_on_slack
capabilities.description: Fetch recent messages where the bot/user is mentioned (optionally by channel).
